ingredients.item: 400g pack Waitrose Aberdeen Angus Beef Lean Minced (10% fat)
150ml Baron des Tours Medoc red wine
400g pack Cooks’ Ingredients Vegetables and Mixed Beans For Soups, Stews and Tagines

instructions.step: Preheat the oven to 160ºC, gas mark 3. Fry the mince and paprika in a saucepan to brown for 3–4 minutes. Add the wine, stock and tomato purée with 150ml water. Bring to the boil and add the vegetable and bean mix.
Transfer to a casserole dish, cover and cook for 1½ hours.
